concept.title: Internships for Credit
concept.shortdesc: Receiving college credit for an internship

conbody.p: Students may be able to receive college credit in return for an internship. You can earn credit for up to two internships completed in different semesters. When you are thinking about applying for an intern position, keep in mind two main criteria:

li.p: The internship should involve significant time writing in a professional setting.

ul.li: You should be supervised by someone on-site who can teach you relevant professional skills and is willing to provide a progress report and final evaluation.

conbody.p: If you need more information or if you have questions about the internship process, please feel free to contact, Dr. Carlos Evia, the internship coordinator.
